actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from imposing certain safety standards, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Transportation from establishing or continuing in effect any standard which requires any motor vehicle to be equipped with upper torso restraints, or with any device which is designed to indicate that seatbelts or upper torso restraints are not being utilized by drivers and passengers. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 1392)

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from imposing certain safety standards, and for other purposes.
